entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
